product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 4 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Sturdily built for 4 people (or 3 and a dog), the freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 4 Tent provides your family a home away from home in the campground. Shockcorded fiberglass poles are 1 size larger than normal for strength and sturdiness. Polyester taffeta body and fly are lightweight yet long-lasting. Walls have been left uncoated so the tent can breathe under the urethane-coated fly, which reduces condensation buildup. Center fly pole creates an awning over each door; full-coverage rainfly ensures excellent rain protection. Factory-sealed seams on the floor and fly increase water repellency. 2 doors allow easy entry and exit, so you don't have to crawl over others to get in and out. Second door also aids cross-ventilation in hot weather. Mesh storage pockets and gear loft keep small items organized. Stakes and guy ropes are included with the ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 4 Tent. Special buy.
short_description: Sturdily built for 4 people (or 3 and a dog), the freestanding ALPS Mountaineering Meramac 4 Tent provides your family a home away from home in the campground.
